## shinydashboard

<dfn>A package for R that builds on Shiny for more flexible and visually appealing UIs.</dfn>

[Shiny Dashboard or shinydashboard](https://rstudio.github.io/shinydashboard/) can be installed with `install.packages("shinydashboard")`, and can be loaded with `library(shinydashboard)`. The [shinydashboard documentation](https://rstudio.github.io/shinydashboard/get_started.html) is a great introduction to this package.
